prod_short_desc: Take a swipe at Magneto with the mighty Wolverine!
prod_long_desc:
Stage a mutant-powered battle between Wolverine and Magneto. Wolverine has long claws and a Mighty Micros jet featuring extendable wings to help him escape being pulled in by Magneto’s magnet-shaped car and magnetic powers. Includes 2 minifigures with mini legs.
Includes Wolverine and Magneto minifigures with mini legs.
Wolverine’s Mighty Micros jet features 4 movable wings.
Magneto’s Mighty Micros car features a classic magnet shape at the rear.
Use Wolverine’s claws to swipe at Magneto.
Accessory elements include Magneto's decorated-translucent magnetic power.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Wolverine's Mighty Micros jet with wings folded in measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide.
Magneto’s Mighty Micros car measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide.
